snippet: LEAD: DESPITE a 1 percent reduction in wine consumption nationwide last year and a continuing decline of grape acreage in California, the volume of chardonnay planted there reached an all-time high in 1987, a leading California-oriented trade publ...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: DESPITE a 1 percent reduction in wine consumption nationwide last year and a continuing decline of grape acreage in California, the volume of chardonnay planted there reached an all-time high in 1987, a leading California-oriented trade publication reports.

headline.main: A Portrait Of Tastes In Wine
